title: Adelaide
alternative_title: Adelaide's la dolce vita ; La dolce vita di Adelaide ; La dulce vida de Adelaida ; La vie douce de Adélaïde ; Аделаида ; アデライド ; 阿黛尔的冷面公爵 ; 아델라이드 ; 아델라이드의 라 돌체 비타
status: Adelaide's la dolce vita ; La dolce vita di Adelaide ; La dulce vida de Adelaida ; La vie douce de Adélaïde ; Аделаида ; アデライド ; 阿黛尔的冷面公爵 ; 아델라이드 ; 아델라이드의 라 돌체 비타
description:
Description :
        Was I reborn? In my previous life I was a designer who had just graduated but one day I had an accident. Adelaide, that's my new name. My new life feels very boring, but then I heard news that there is a girl who can move between dimensions so I decided to go to the capital to meet her. Is there something waiting for me in the capital?
